Package controller

Class WordleController

java.lang.Object
controller.WordleController
public class WordleController extends Object
This class is the controller class for the Wordle program. It has methods to control the flow of the game. It tracks how many guesses had been made,or if the game had ended, or performs calculation to show the user their current progress. This class also has exception classes to handle any sort of error present.
Author:
Muhtasim Al-Farabi, Tyler Conklin

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    WordleController.CorrectLengthException
    This class is used in the view to catch exceptions where the guess does not follow the length constrain of our game.
    class 
    WordleController.NotInDictionaryException
    This class is used in the view to catch exceptions where the guess does not belong to any of the words in dictionary.txt.
    class 
    WordleController.OnlyLettersException
    This class is used in the view to catch exceptions where the letters of the guess contains characters other than alphabets.

    • makeGuess

      public void makeGuess​(String guess) throws WordleController.OnlyLettersException, WordleController.NotInDictionaryException, WordleController.CorrectLengthException
      Takes a guess and stores into the progress

      This method calls the makeGuess method from the model and returns the output of the method

      Parameters:
      guess - an instance of Guess, contains information about the current guess
      Throws:
      WordleController.OnlyLettersException - if guess contains non-alphabet letter
      WordleController.NotInDictionaryException - if guess is not in the Dictionary.txt file
      WordleController.CorrectLengthException - if guess is not equal to the allowed Length
